read.read: SELECT rule.*, GROUP_CONCAT(unit.idUnit) idUnits, `interval`.timeValidity, notification.system, notification.emails FROM rules_engine.rule LEFT JOIN rules_engine.unit ON rule.id = unit.idRule LEFT JOIN rules_engine.`interval` ON rule.id = `interval`.idRule LEFT JOIN rules_engine.notification ON rule.id = notification.idRule where `rule`.`deleted` = 0 and rule.idUser = #idUser#

queries.create: insert into rules_engine.rule (expression, idUser, idCompany, enabled, name, description, type, priority, status, timestamp) values (#expression#, #idUser#, #idCompany#, #enabled#, #name#, #description#, #type#, #priority#, #status#, now())
queries.select: SELECT rule.*, `interval`.timeValidity FROM rules_engine.rule rule left join rules_engine.`interval` `interval` on rule.id = `interval`.idRule where 1 = 1 and rule.id = #idRule# and rule.idUser = #idUser# and rule.deleted = 0
queries.update: UPDATE rules_engine.rule SET expression = IF(Isnull(#expression#), expression, #expression#), idUser = IF(Isnull(#idUser#), idUser, #idUser#), idCompany = IF(Isnull(#idCompany#), idCompany, #idCompany#), enabled = IF(Isnull(#enabled#), enabled, #enabled#), name = IF(Isnull(#name#), name, #name#), description = IF(Isnull(#description#), description, #description#), #logicalOperator#), type = IF(Isnull(#type#), type, #type#), priority = IF(Isnull(#priority#), priority, #priority#), status = IF(Isnull(#status#), status, #status#) WHERE rule.id = #idRule# AND rule.idUser = #idUser# and rule.deleted = 0
queries.update2: UPDATE rules_engine.rule SET enabled = IF(Isnull(#enabled#), enabled, #enabled#) WHERE rule.id = #idRule# AND rule.idUser = #idUser# and rule.deleted = 0
queries.delete: UPDATE rules_engine.rule SET deleted = 1 WHERE id = #idRule# AND idUser = #idUser#
